scripts.publish: py setup.py sdist bdist_wheel && py -m twine upload --repository pypi dist/*
scripts.make-docs-windows: cd _src && make html && Xcopy /Y /I /E .\build\html ..\docs && type nul > ../docs/.nojekyll
scripts.full-make-docs-windows: cd _src && py .\autodoc_dt.py && make html && Xcopy /Y /I /E .\build\html ..\docs && type nul > ../docs/.nojekyll
scripts.test: set TF_CPP_MIN_LOG_LEVEL=2 && py -W ignore -m unittest discover
